name: Lamium
details: Has a special affinity for female and urinary organs. Headache, WITH BACKWARD AND FORWARD MOTION OF HEAD. Leucorrhoea and menses too early and scanty. Hemorrhoids; hard stool, with blood. Sensation in urethra as though a drop of water were flowing through it. Tearing in the extremities. Hemoptysis. Blisters on heel from slight rubbing. Ulcers on heel. (CEPA.)
